quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to TextWorld! Please retrieve the broom from the board.

Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. First, it would be fantastic if you could recover the broom from the board inside the sauna. Then, retrieve the Canadian style keycard from the shelf. If you can get your hands on the Canadian style keycard, make absolutely sure that the Canadian style hatch is unlocked. After that, open the Canadian style hatch within the sauna. And then, travel west. Then, recover the passkey from the floor of the studio. And then, go to the east. Okay, and then, insert the passkey into the locker's lock to unlock it. After unlocking the locker, ensure that the locker within the sauna is open. After that, put the broom into the locker in the sauna. That's it!
commands: take Canadian style keycard from shelf
unlock Canadian style hatch with Canadian style keycard
take Canadian style keycard from shelf
unlock Canadian style hatch with Canadian style keycard

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the sauna.

 You can see a locker.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_0]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] What a letdown! The locker is empty![end if] You can make out a shelf. The shelf is typical.[if there is something on the s_0] On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] The shelf appears to be empty. Hm. Oh well[end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a board. The board is usual.[if there is something on the s_1] On the board you see [a list of things on the s_1]. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] Canadian style hatch leading west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a studio. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You can make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] spherical chest.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The spherical chest contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The spherical chest is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] Canadian style hatch leading east. There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
You arrive in a salon. A typical kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a desk. The desk is usual.[if there is something on the s_2] On the desk you can see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if] You see a bed stand. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the bed stand.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a restroom. A normal kind of place. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You make out a safe.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] dresser close by.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The dresser is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a kitchen. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You can make out a fridge. Classic TextWorld.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The fridge is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden gateway leading west.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bedchamber. A typical kind of place.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden gateway leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You are in a basement. A typical kind of place. Let's see what's in here.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a table. [if there is something on the s_4]On the table you see [a list of things on the s_4]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]The table appears to be empty. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

 There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You arrive in a lounge. A typical one. Let's see what's in here.



 There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You are in a pantry. A normal one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You can make out a stand. [if there is something on the s_5]You see [a list of things on the s_5] on the stand.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a cookery. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a formless chest.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The formless chest contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] What a letdown! The formless chest is empty![end if] You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a rack. The rack is usual.[if there is something on the s_6] On the rack you can see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] But there isn't a thing on it. You think about smashing the rack to bits, throwing the bits in a fire, etc, until you get bored.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a cellar. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You're now in a closet.

 Look over there! a trunk.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_6]. You look around you, at all the containers and supporters, doors and objects, and you think to yourself. Why? Why Textworld?[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
Ah, the launderette. This is some kind of launderette, really great normal vibes in this place, a wonderful normal atmosphere. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You arrive in a canteen. A normal kind of place.

 You can make out [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] case.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The case contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The case is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You're now in a steam room. Let's see what's in here.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a drawer.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_8]. You wonder idly who left that here.[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] What a letdown! The drawer is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cookhouse. An usual kind of place.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a freezer.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_9]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] What a letdown! The freezer is empty![end if] You see a chair. The chair is usual.[if there is something on the s_7] On the chair you can see [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so standard all of a sudden, it's because you've just walked into the bedroom.



There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You are in a bathroom. A standard one.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You arrive in a parlor. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a shower. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You scan the room for a box, and you find a box.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The box contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The box is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

walkthrough: take Canadian style keycard from shelf
unlock Canadian style hatch with Canadian style keycard

objective: You are now playing a fast paced round of TextWorld! First of all, pick up the broom from the board in the sauna. With the broom, pick up the Canadian style keycard from the shelf in the sauna. And then, unlock the Canadian style hatch with the Canadian style keycard. And then, ensure that the Canadian style hatch is open. And then, head west. Once you succeed at that, retrieve the passkey from the floor of the studio. After that, move east. Next, insert the passkey into the locker's lock to unlock it. And then, ensure that the locker within the sauna is open. And then, place the broom into the locker in the sauna. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
